description:
Ial is one of the http://anidb.net/ch16877 [Queen]`s personal bodyguards, the Sezan, and also one of the few the Royal Family trusts personally. He takes his job, protecting the Queen and http://anidb.net/ch16876 [the Princess], very seriously.
He is known throughout the nation as "Godspeed Ial" for his ability to run at an inhuman pace.
Ial acts cold and unsociable around others, even to his comrades and http://anidb.net/ch16937 [his mentor]. However he has a soft spot for http://anidb.net/ch93797 [Erin], who is the only person he mostly smiles at and knows of his past. For her safety, he tries to keep his distance from her.
He later becomes one of the few people who knows Erin`s dark past, and promises that he`ll keep quiet about it until the time is ready. There are hints showing that Ial seems to be in love with Erin.
name: Ial
